Package ControlPanel

Class ControlPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
ControlPanel.ControlPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class ControlPanel
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, java.lang.Runnable, javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
This class is the implementation of the GUI for managing billboards, schedules and users. It requires a user to log in, and permissions are checked before actions are allowed to be performed. Once a user has logged in, they are able to access the different functions which are spread out across tabs. The Manage Billboards tab allows users to create billboards, edit billboards, delete billboards and preview billboards (depending on permissions). Create and edit billboards utilize the CreateBillboards class: CreateBillboards Billboards are displayed in a list which is pulled from the server. See layoutBBManagerTab() The View Schedule tab displays all currently scheduled billboards in a weekly view. Schedules are pulled from the server and the viewer displays the start time, end time, billboard time, billboard name and scheduling user. The View Schedule tab also lets users (with correct permissions) schedule a billboard with day/hour/minute control over scheduling. See: AddToSchedule See: layoutSchedulerTab() The Manage Users tab allows authorized users to add users (including selecting their permissions) and delete users. The tab queries the server for a list of users and displays it to the user. See: AddUserForm See: layoutUserMngTab() The Launch Billboard tab allows users to launch the Billboard viewer and display scheduled billboards. See: Billboard See: layoutLaunchBBTab()
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • ControlPanel

      public ControlPanel()
      Basic constructor that gives the GUI the title 'Control Panel'.

  • Method Details

    • createGUI

      private void createGUI()
      Main method for initializing and setting up the GUI. Adds a listener so that when the user closes the window a logout is performed. Set to default size of 1200*900. The initial tabbed panes are created here but their implementation is broken out into separate methods for code readability and screen refresh functionality. Makes use of the helper method createButton(String)

    • createButton

      private javax.swing.JButton createButton​(java.lang.String str)
      Helper method to reduce duplicate code and improve readability. Initializes a button, adds an action listener and labels it with the String passed as an argument.
      Parameters:
      str - - String to be used as button label
      Returns:
      JButton object

    • layoutLogInTab

      private void layoutLogInTab()
      Method to setup the layout for the login tab. This is the first tab seen when the program is run, and users must login to move to other tabs. Login is implemented with loginPerformed(). Logout is implemented with logoutPerformed()

    • layoutBBManagerTab

      private void layoutBBManagerTab()
      Method to setup the layout for the Billboard Manager tab. When method is first called a connection is made to the server and the list of billboards populated. Contains buttons for creating, editing, deleting and previewing billbaords.

    • layoutSchedulerTab

      private void layoutSchedulerTab()
      Method to set up the layout for the scheduler tab. When called, this method queries the server for a list of schedules and displays it on a 7-day calendar using ArrayLists. Includes a button 'Schedule Billboards' for users with the appropriate permissions to be add a billboard to the schedule. This launches a new window where the user can select from billboards available on the server and schedule them by day, hour and minute. See AddToSchedule

    • layoutUserMngTab

      private void layoutUserMngTab()
      Method to setup the layout for the user management tab. When first called, the server is queried and a list populated with usernames existing on the server. Includes the buttons 'Add User' and 'Delete User' so that users with the appropriate permissions can make changes to the users on the server. See: AddUserForm

    • layoutLaunchBBTab

      private void layoutLaunchBBTab()
      Method to create the tab that lets users launch the billboard viewer. Simple screen with just one button: Launch Billboard. See: Billboard

    • run

      public void run()
      Implementation of the run() method from interface Runnable. Called after the constructor. Gets the system look and feel, runs createGUI() and sets preferred size and location before packing and setting to visible.
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • actionPerformed

      public void actionPerformed​(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
      Implementation of method from ActionListener interface. Contains much of the functionality for different buttons in the class.
      Specified by:
      actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
      Parameters:
      e - the parameter passed is the action event whenever one of the buttons is used

    • stateChanged

      public void stateChanged​(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent e)
      Checks to see if a tab has been switched. The tab that the user switches to is then refreshed by calling it's corresponding initialization method.
      Specified by:
      stateChanged in interface javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
      Parameters:
      e - ChangeEvent object

    • valueChanged

      public void valueChanged​(javax.swing.event.ListSelectionEvent e)
      Detects if the user has selected a billboard in the list on the Billboard Manager tab. Sets a global variable to the selection for passing to functions such as "Edit Billboard" or "Delete Billboard".
      Specified by:
      valueChanged in interface javax.swing.event.ListSelectionListener
      Parameters:
      e - ListSelectionEvent object

    • loginPerformed

      private void loginPerformed()
      The login method which returns a result whether an error message or the token, username, and permissions of the user. Communication with the server for user authentication is encrypted.

    • logoutPerformed

      private void logoutPerformed()
      When the user logs out of the control panel remove authentication and lock the the control panel again

    • changePanelSetting

      private void changePanelSetting​(boolean change)
      Disables or Enables the tabs on the control panel
      Parameters:
      change - the current boolean value for the tabs to be enabled or disabled

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Runs the Control Panel. Executes the runnable on the AWT event-dispatching thread for thread-safety.
      Parameters:
      args - command line args unused
